name: Battle Strike: WWII [BETA]
description:
Battle Strike: WWII is a game for fans of the ultimate shooting game and you can play it for free. Compete against the terrorists on 3 different maps and kill as many as possible. That sounds easier than it is. This game is not only about your shooting skills but also about speed.

Watch the field of play and aim at your opponents the moment they appear. Don't give them a second to meet you. When your ammunition is empty, you can reload with the space bar and continue shooting. Do you think you can master any level? Find out now and have fun with Battle Strike: WWII!

Controls:
Mouse = Aim and Shoot
P = Weapon Wheel
R = Eeload
C = Crouch
G = Grenade
